resources.string: No places found, because location permission is disabled.

Recycling Requirements 

Plastic bottles and containers are to be rinsed before recycling. Only plastic bottles with recycle codes 01 or 02 can be recycled.

Common 01 recyclable bottles include: 

Soft drink bottles, water bottles, peanut butter jars, salad dressing, cooking oil, many cleaning products.

Common 02 recyclable bottles include: 

Milk and juice jugs, bleach, laundry detergent, shampoo, motor oil, some retail bags and trash bags, some yogurt and butter tubs, cereal box liners. 

Recycling Locations 

Plastic bottles can be recycled at all recycling bins found near common trash disposal areas.
Oh no, your cart is empty!\n\nPress the add button at the top right corner to start recycling!
